sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>rm_scrum_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="rm_scrum_task">stateCHANGESTO3^ORstateCHANGESTO4^EQ<item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value="3"/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="true" value="4"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Send scrum task result to story work not</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gr = new GlideRecord('rm_story');
	gr.get('sys_id', current.story);
	var newNote = current.number + ' (' + current.type.getDisplayValue() + ') ' + current.short_description + ' has been marked as ' + current.state.getDisplayValue() + '.';
	if (current.type == '4') newNote += ' Result was ' + current.test_result + '.';
	gr.work_notes = newNote;
	gr.update();
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin-eduque</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-03-14 20:22:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d2c1135a13f8174093625dcf3244b091</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Send scrum task result to story work not</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d2c1135a13f8174093625dcf3244b091</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin-eduque</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-14 20:25:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>

value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Save acceptance criteria to work notes</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Whenever acceptance criteria changes, save the new version to the work notes
	
	var newNote = '';
	if (current.acceptance_criteria){
		newNote = 'Acceptance Criteria:\n[code]'+current.acceptance_criteria+'[/code]';
	} else {
		newNote = 'Acceptance Criteria has been cleared.';
	}
	current.work_notes = newNote;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin-eduque</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-03-13 23:32:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d7143e8a13b0174093625dcf3244b0fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Save acceptance criteria to work notes</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d7143e8a13b0174093625dcf3244b0fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin-eduque</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-13 23:45:04</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>

notes</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Whenever acceptance criteria changes, save the new version to the work notes
	
	var newNote = '';
	if (current.acceptance_criteria){
		newNote = 'Acceptance Criteria:\n[code]'+current.acceptance_criteria+'[/code]';
	} else {
		newNote = 'Acceptance Criteria has been cleared.';
	}
	current.work_notes = newNote;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin-eduque</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-03-13 23:32:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d7143e8a13b0174093625dcf3244b0fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Save acceptance criteria to work notes</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d7143e8a13b0174093625dcf3244b0fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin-eduque</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-15 21:55:19</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>
